name: Godette (Rigged)
description: Fully rigged 3D Model of 'Godette', the mascot of the Godot Engine (https://godotengine.org/), created in Blender 3.2 (although the rig should also work in older versions).

name: Godot Plush by FR3NKD
description: The digital edition of the legendary Godot plush.
